movies.title: I Do
movies.plot: Mayumi "Yumi" Punongbayan (Erich Gonzales) has been looking for her soulmate all her life. When she meets Lance Anderson "Lance" Tan (Enchong Dee), she feels that he is the guy who is destined for her... her 'the one'. Lance, on the other hand, believes that everything in love is a choice. In spite of differences, they agree on one thing: their love would conquer all. And so, Lance & Yumi have made efforts to seal their great love. As they plan out for the day they would be one, their wedding date keeps on being postponed due to obstacles - Yumi's unexpected pregnancy and Lance's family - that place their relationship on rocks and to a great test. Would Yumi still cling to her belief that love is by fate? Would Lance still choose Yumi over his family that is against their love? Would Yumi finally have her dream wedding?
movies.simplePlot: Mayumi "Yumi" Punongbayan (Erich Gonzales) has been looking for her soulmate all her life. When she meets Lance Anderson "Lance" Tan (Enchong Dee), she feels that he is the guy who is ...

biography.bio: Erich Gonzales was born on September 20, 1990 in Cebu City, Philippines as Erika Chryselle Gonzales Gancayco. She is an actress, known for Maria la del Barrio (2011), Tanging yaman (2010) and Magkaribal (2010).
biography.name: Erich Gonzales

biography.bio: Enchong Dee was born as Ernest Lorenzo Dee. He is an actor, known for Maria la del Barrio (2011), Tanging yaman (2010) and Magkaribal (2010).
biography.name: Enchong Dee

biography.bio: Pokwang was born on August 27, 1960 as Marietta Subong. She is an actress, known for Aryana (2012), Toda Max (2011) and A Mother's Story (2011).
biography.name: Pokwang

biography.bio: Dennis Padilla was born as Dennis Esteban Dominguez Baldivia. He is an actor, known for Alyas Robin Hood (2016), Wako Wako (2012) and Angelito: Batang ama (2011). He is married to Marjorie Barretto.
biography.name: Dennis Padilla

biography.bio: Jun Urbano is an actor and writer, known for Juan Tamad at Mr. Shooli: Mongolian Barbecue (1991), M.O.N.A.Y (Misteyks obda neyson adres Yata) ni Mr. Shooli (2007) and Magic Temple (1996).
biography.name: Jun Urbano

biography.bio: Ricardo Cepeda was born on October 11, 1964 in Manila, Philippines as Richard Cepeda Go. He is an actor, known for My Binondo Girl (2011), Green Rose (2011) and Pintada (2012).
biography.name: Ricardo Cepeda

biography.bio: Isay Alvarez is an actress, known for Someone to Watch Over Me (2016), Juanita Banana (2010) and Tanging yaman (2010). She is married to Robert Seña.
biography.name: Isay Alvarez

biography.bio: Janus del Prado is an actor, known for Green Rose (2011), Ang lalaking nagmahal sa akin (2009) and My Cheating Heart (2009).
biography.name: Janus del Prado

biography.placeOfBirth: General Santos City, South Cotabato, Philippines
biography.bio: Melai Cantiveros was born on April 6, 1988 in General Santos City, South Cotabato, Philippines as Melisa Cantiveros. She is an actress, known for Pinoy Big Brother (2005), I Dare You (2011) and Impostor (2010). She has been married to Jason Francisco since December 9, 2013. They have one child.
biography.name: Melai Cantiveros

biography.bio: Allyzon Lualhati is an actress, known for Can This Be Love (2005), I Do (2010) and Tuhog (2013).
biography.name: Allyzon Lualhati

biography.bio: Alwyn Uytingco was born on February 11, 1988 in Quezon City, Philippines as Cipriano Alwyn Sumulong Uytingco III. He is an actor, known for Kapitan Awesome (2012), John John (2007) and Ang tanging ina mo: Last na 'to! (2010). He has been married to Jennica Garcia since February 2014. They have one child.
biography.name: Alwyn Uytingco

biography.bio: Nash Aguas was born on October 10, 1998 in the Philippines as Aeign Zachrey Nash Aguas. He is an actor, known for Luv U (2012), The Wanderer in the Land of Elementalia (2008) and Wansapanataym (2010).
biography.name: Nash Aguas

biography.bio: Jane Oineza was born on July 22, 1997 in the Philippines as Elizabeth Jane Oineza. She is an actress, known for Maria la del Barrio (2011), Maalaala mo kaya (1991) and Amorosa: The Revenge (2012).
biography.name: Jane Oineza

biography.bio: Eliza Pineda was born on August 23, 1995 in Quezon City, Philippines. She is an actress, known for Angelito: Batang ama (2011), Thelma (2011) and Maalaala mo kaya (1991).
biography.name: Eliza Pineda

biography.bio: Che Ramos is an actress, known for The Blood Trail (2009), Faculty (2010) and Child of the Sun (2009).
biography.name: Che Ramos

categories.category: New Movie Actress of the Year
